AIFM.summary: AIFarm, Ltd., a development stage company, develops a proprietary growing system that designs and builds custom biodomes worldwide. Its biodomes are used for commercial agricultural concerns, as well as small local producers. The company was formerly known as Eco Energy Tech Asia, Ltd. and changed its name to AIFarm, Ltd. in January 2020. AIFarm, Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

TAKD.summary: TransAKT Ltd., through its subsidiary, TransAKT Bio Agritech Ltd., engages in the research and development of agricultural technology. It markets, sells, and distributes indoor agricultural equipment, including lighting, irrigation, and hydroponic growing systems. TransAKT Ltd. has operations primarily in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Mainland China, and Singapore. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Fo Tan, Hong Kong.
